# ICMA 9/18/25 

```{r}
flights |>
  group_by(month)
```

```{r}
flights |>
  group_by(month, day) |>
  count()
```

```{r}
flights |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarise(mean_arr_delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE), 
        sd_arr_delay = sd(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE), 
        number_delayed = sum(arr_delay > 0, na.rm = TRUE), 
        number_total = n()) |>

  mutate(percentage = number_delayed/number_total) |>
  ggplot(aes(y = percentage, x = month)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:12) + 
  ylim(0, 0.55)
```

#ICMA 09/30/25
```{r}
flights |>
  mutate(gain = arr_delay - dep_delay) |>
  filter(!is.na(gain)) |>
  group_by(carrier) |>
  summarize(
    avg_gain = mean(gain), 
    total_flights = n()
    ) |>
  arrange(desc(avg_gain)) |>
  select(carrier, avg_gain, total_flights)
```

# ICMA 10/23/25
```{r}
str_length(c("a", "R for data science", NA))
```

```{r}
view(babynames)
```

```{r}
babynames |>
  mutate(contains_ie = str_detect(name,
                                  pattern = "ie"))
```

```{r}
babynames |>
  mutate(contains_a = str_count(str_to_lower(name), 
                                 pattern = "a")) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = contains_a))
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
str_detect(fruit, "^.*$")
```

```{r}
str_detect(fruit, "\\{.+\\}")
```

```{r}
str_detect(c("{}", "{hello}", "{hi"), "\\{.+\\}")
```

```{r}
babynames |>
  filter(str_detect(name, "^[AEIOU]"))
```

```{r}
babynames |> 
  filter(str_detect(name, "^[^AEIOUaeiou][AEIOUaeiou]"))
```
